document.full_text: a federal judge ruled that police violated the constitutional rights of an american citizen and his father when deputies stopped their truck and took them to a business where an immigration raid was under way.
document.title: southwest: arizona: judge rules against maricopa deputies
lines_and_colors: a federal judge ruled that police violated the constitutional rights of an american citizen and his father when deputies stopped their truck and took them to a business where an immigration raid was under way.
